How to Create a Procedure Using SweetProcess

This procedure shows you how to create your own procedures with SweetProcess. You can edit this procedure, approve it so it becomes the live version, delete it, or share it with anyone who will be documenting procedures.
Assigned
C
Due Data
10:39 a.m. tomorrow
Repeat Task
Once Only
Progress
0/10
  • STEPS
  • ACTIVITY
  • COMMENTS

  1. Log in and click the "Create a Procedure" button

    By making use of a tag, you will be assigning an index keyword/phrase/term to a procedure so that it can be quickly identified.

  2. All done? Click "All My Procedures"

    This will take you back to the dashboard, where you can manage all of your procedures.
